DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective present study examine effect delay umbilical cord clamp preterm infant neonatal outcome use prospective randomize control trial compare immediate cord clamping ( standard present ) delay cord clamping . Our specific aim determine 30 45 second delay umbilical cord clamp improves neonatal outcome assess composite intraventricular hemorrhage late onset sepsis preterm infant bear 24 32 week gestation . Secondary outcome examine include improvement follow : 1 ) lung function assess oxygen dependency 36 week correct gestational age ( CGA ) , 2 ) cardiovascular function assess need volume expansion , inotropes , clinically suspect PDA require intervention prior discharge home , 3 ) anemia assess initial hemoglobin , need transfusion stay NICU , number transfusion .
DOC.brief_title: Delayed Umbilical Cord Clamping Infants Less Than 32 Weeks
DOC.criteria: Women labour plan delivery gestational age 24 0/7 32 0/7 week gestation . Singleton pregnancy ( Note : pregnancy multiple gestation demise occur prior 13 week , patient include study ) .
